main.you_may_check_eligibility: You may check your eligibility for the elections by requesting a sign in link. Link will be sent to the email address you have submitted to the Helsinki University Student Registry by DD.MM.2015.
main.you_may_request_session_link: Request a sign in link to the email address you have submitted to the Helsinki University Student Registry by DD.MM.2015
main.signin_will_commence_at: The service is available as follows:

info.ingress: Elections of the student members to the College, the Department Council and the Faculty Council.
info.signin_is_available_at: Signing in is availailable as follows
info.election_dates_explained: between dd DD.MM.2015 at HH:00 and HH:00 ja dd DD.MM.2015 at HH:00 - HH:00. Voting will end at dd DD.MM.2015 klo HH:05 for those who signed in before dd DD.MM.2015 klo HH:00.
